title: SQL ServerSYSTEM_USERFunction

metadata.description: Learn about SQL ServerSYSTEM_USERFunction with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
❯
Example
Return the login name information for the current user:
SELECT SYSTEM_USER;

Definition and Usage
The SYSTEM_USER function returns the login name for the current user.
Syntax
SYSTEM_USER
Technical Details
Works in:
SQL Server (starting with 2008), Azure SQL Data Warehouse, Parallel Data 
  Warehouse

❯
★
+1
